DOC.brief_summary: This study examine body take GW679769 alone together rifampin healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Healthy Subjects Assess How Dosing Rifampin Affects What Body Does Dose GW679769 ( Casopitant ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : healthy female subject become pregnant able swallow keep oral medication understand follow protocol requirement instruction Exclusion criterion : smoke least 4 pack per day past 12 month use prescription nonprescription drug ( ) herbal dietary supplement vitamins 14 day prior first dose study medication clinically relevant abnormality medical condition circumstance make subject unsuitable study per study doctor blood donation excess 1 pint within 56 day dose medication iron deficient history drug allergy study medication history drug alcohol abuse dependency within past 6 month subject use nicotinecontaining product within last 6 month positive HIV , Hepatitis B C active peptic ulcer disease uncontrolled nausea vomit active infection heart failure female lactate female positive pregnancy test
